source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Performance Management For Managers
items.headline: ​Learn to successfully monitor, encourage and positively improve the performance of employees in the workplace
objectives_summary: Support employees in creating and implementing goals
Assess and evaluate performances of individuals
Create a plan for success that aligns with the company's vision

items.title: Manage Change Through Collaboration and Team Work
items.headline: Change Management Success - How Collaboration Can Help When You Lead and Manage Change.
objectives_summary: Appreciate the nature of change today and its impact on people
Distinguish the difference between change avoiders and chase chasers and their impact on change projects
Understand the Emotional Change Curve

items.title: Leadership - The #1 Key to Guaranteed Business Success
items.headline: How to Lead Your Business and Yourself To Massive Success and Greater Income
objectives_summary: Learn the Time Mastery Secrets from Top Income Earners
Learn To Overcome the Obstacles to Your Success
Know 3 Ways to Accomplish the Most Valuable Things in Your Business

items.title: Ally Up: Using allyship to advance diversity & inclusion

visible_instructors.name: Victoria
visible_instructors.title: Victoria Mattingly
visible_instructors.job_title: Organizational psychologist making work better for humans

items.headline: How to connect across difference and build a better, more equitable workplace and world — together
objectives_summary: What allyship is and how it benefits allies and those they partner with
How to be an ally AND how to partner with an ally
How to use allyship to promote diversity and inclusion at your organization

items.title: GDPR – in a nutshell – 2nd edition
items.headline: EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) – key awareness topics
objectives_summary: Rationale & overview
Data protection principles
About data subjects’ rights

items.title: ISO 45001. Occupational Health & Safety management system
items.headline: Build a career in occupational health & safety. Learn the requirements of ISO 45001.
objectives_summary: Build a career in occupational health and safety management
Understand the requirements of ISO 45001
Implement an occupational health and safety management system

items.title: Change Management: Real World Strategies & Tools

visible_instructors.name: Mike
visible_instructors.title: Mike Clayton
visible_instructors.job_title: Real World Trainer in Personal Effectiveness

items.headline: A Practical Introduction to Change Management and Leadership for Managers and Project Managers
objectives_summary: Convince people about the need for change
Evaluate how people feel about the changes
Paint a compelling picture of the future

items.title: ISO 14001:2015 Environmental management system
items.headline: How to implement an Environmental Management System and obtain ISO 14001:2015 certification.
objectives_summary: Understand ALL the requirements of ISO 14001:2015
Implement an Environmental Management System according to ISO 14001:2015
Take part in environmental audits as per ISO 14001:2015

items.title: Form Your Virtual Team & Lead Your Virtual Team
items.headline: These days everything’s moving online, even your team. Learn what it takes to form your team & lead, virtual style.
objectives_summary: Communicate clearly & openly with diverse teams
Resolve conflict & coach effectively
Foster trust & formalize team roles

items.title: Leadership: Growth Mindset for Leadership and Organizations

visible_instructors.name: Transformation
visible_instructors.title: Transformation Services
visible_instructors.job_title: International Academy of Life Coaching & Entrepreneurship

items.headline: Become a great leader, unlock employee potential & inspire a creative corporate culture by embracing a growth mindset
objectives_summary: Develop the #1 most important leadership quality (the growth mindset)
Feel confident in your ability to learn any skill you need to be a great leader
Understand the true depth of human potential

items.title: Learn Risk Analysis, Evaluation & Assessment - from A to Z
items.headline: Became an expert of the fundamental tecniques and tools in risk management and assessment (PHA, FTA, FMEA, HAZOP, HACCP)
objectives_summary: Perform a risk analysis, evaluation and assessment
Use standard risk assessment tools like FMEA, FTA, PHA, HAZOP and HACCP
Understand the various techniques of risk analysis

items.title: Inspirational Leadership Skills
items.headline: Motivational leadership skills to inspire your team
objectives_summary: How to be a truly Inspirational Leader
Mastering communication with all level of your team
How to motivate teams and personalise your approach

items.title: Master the Product Manager Interview - The Complete Guide

visible_instructors.name: Charles
visible_instructors.title: Charles Du
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-Winning Product Manager @ NASA, Apple, Ticketmaster

items.headline: Learn the secrets to giving perfect answers at a product management interview, get noticed, and land multiple job offers
objectives_summary: Deliver perfect answers to common product manager interview questions
Fix common product manager resume mistakes
Create an online product portfolio to market yourself

items.title: Developing Your Team - Forming to Performing

visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach

items.headline: A Team Building Guide - How To Build A High Performing Self-Directed Team
objectives_summary: They will learn the essentials of forming a team and leading that team to high performance
They will learn how to develop a team charter.
They will develop a team scorecard to serve as the foundation of motivation.

items.title: Mastering Effective Communication

visible_instructors.name: Barry
visible_instructors.title: Barry Winbolt
visible_instructors.job_title: Peronal development training for life and career

items.headline: How to make your conversations more meaningful, concise and mutually satisfying
objectives_summary: You will understand advanced communication concepts often not covered by formal education
The main elements of effective communication
How to make your communications 'fit for purpose'

items.title: Communication Skills every Manager should Master

visible_instructors.name: Ramon
visible_instructors.title: Ramon Janssen
visible_instructors.job_title: MBA, Management & Leadership Coach, Author, Entrepreneur

items.headline: Powerful Communication Techniques to better Delegate, Communicate Decisions, Change Resistance, Say No & Admit Mistakes
objectives_summary: Know and understand what the Sweet Spot for Employee Achievement is
Understand the Influence of Positive Communication on Employee Performance
Know How to Create a Secure Base for High Employee Performance
